headline: Should Ferrari’s Volume Cap and New Credit Facility Reshape Its Long‑Term Story for (BIT:RACE) Investors?
summary: In early December 2025, Ferrari N.V. replaced its cancelled €350 million unsecured committed revolving credit facility maturing in 2026 with a new five-year €350 million facility at a lower cost of capital, while its subsidiary Ferrari S.p.A. renewed and upgraded a long-running sponsorship partnership with Philip Morris International effective January 1, 2026.
